name: Cog in the Machine
description:
Cog in the Machine

A short escape room esque game about corporations.

InputActionWASDMove
Right-clickZoom
EInteractEscCancel / Pause
CtrlCrouch

macOS info: if you're trying to play this on a Mac, you need to run this command:

xattr -dr com.apple.quarantine /path/to/"Cog in the Machine.app"

this is because I do not own a Mac to use for exporting and I can't pay to be an official developer which allows signing macOS applications.
